qas.question: A media magnate from which country bought The Times in the 1980s?
What is the name of the media magnate that bought The Times in the 1980s?
Who did a media magnate in the 1980s buy The Times from?

context: Several suitors appeared, including Robert Maxwell, Tiny Rowland and Lord Rothermere; however, only one buyer was in a position to meet the full <a2_0>Thomson<a2_0/> remit, <a0_0>Australian<a0_0/> media magnate <a1_0>Rupert Murdoch<a1_0/>. Robert Holmes à Court, another Australian magnate had previously tried to buy The Times in 1980.
